Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: ShadowMichele
Reviews.Content: Customer service sucks and its a piece of dirt, cant play games on it and the screen on mine went out 2 months into useage.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET....It's a piece of s***
Reviews.Author: Andrew Rousseau
Reviews.Content: Tablet's speed is extremely slow, won't connect to websites, won't connect to Google play store, touch screen sometimes unresponsive, takes almost 10 minutes to boot up, and it's next to impossible to upgrade the Android operating system.

Reviews.Title: Painfully Slow
Reviews.Author: Eric "Say something about yourself!"
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for with this tablet. The size is great and it's pretty durable.  Speed is painful and it won't connect to Google Play to download additional apps.  You can work around it using Opera, but what a pain.That being said, I bought it for my kiddos mostly and while I wouldn't want one of these for myself, I'm not real worried about it getting beat up by my kids.  So I give it one star for speed and accessibility to apps, and 3 stars for durability.

Reviews.Title: Crappy.
Reviews.Author: Xireana
Reviews.Content: Won't connect to internet. Less then 4GB memory. less then two weeks later it craps out and won't even turn on.

Reviews.Title: Cruz 301
Reviews.Author: pdonald777
Reviews.Content: Some serious flaws. Getting on the internet is a real problem especially with google. Twitter and Facebook is out of the question.

Reviews.Title: cruz tablet..
Reviews.Author: lindy
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet,i am using it now. It's exceed my expectations. It was delivered faster than the delivery date. I would recomend this tablet to those who want a portable system.
